activities: Hygieia collects and processes personal information relating to personnel, including current, future and former employees for human resource functions.  Personal information which may include medical or device personal data, is collected and processed from clients, customers, service providers, and healthcare professionals for customer support and management, distribution and quality monitoring, complaint handling, and other related business activities.
personaldata: Organization, Client, Customer, Service provider, Healthcare professional.  On-line, off-line, and manually processed data.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities, and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
